description: This file appears to be a build recipe or configuration script used in a Yocto/OE build system for the GCC sanitizer libraries, containing functions for configuring, compiling, installing, and packaging related components.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Configures the build environment for the sanitizer libraries, including setting paths, modifying build scripts, and preparing the source directory.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Compiles the sanitizer libraries within the build directory.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs the compiled sanitizer libraries into the staging directory and performs some filesystem cleanup.
